title: Tax on tires, price up and quantity down

content.question: Assume that under new environmental regulations, tire companies have to pay taxes based on how much pollution is created when producing each tire. The price paid by consumers and the quantity of tires sold will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Price
 Quantity

No change
 No change
